price: 31. En als zij weer onder hun eigen mensen waren, bespotten zij hen.
arabic: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُواْ فَكِهِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā inqalabū ilā ahlihimu inqalabū fakihīna
